name: Kachiuma Yosou Soft: Baken Renkinjutsu
overview: Kachiuma Yosou Soft: Baken Renkinjutsu is a horse racing game that is geared towards helping pundits to determine the results of races, by inputting horse and race data and seeing how a hypothetical race might result. The game is very dense with technical horseracing terms and Japanese horseracing rules, so some relevant expertise is required.
